                          double min,
                          double max)
        Clips a number (min max) beteen two values.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to clip
        min - the minimum the result can be (floor)
        max - the maximum the result can be (ceil)
        Returns:
        the new value

                         int rad)

        Parameters:
        ns - the time in nanoseconds
        rad - the radius of the time
        Returns:
        the ticks per second in double form
